name: Egbert Swimbait Storage Box
description:
Egbert Swimbait Storage box consists of a Plano 3731 storage box with a 6061 billet aluminum rod anodized black that allows you to store up to 8 swimbaits. The groove system with rubber o-rings and snaps lets you move baits around with ease while accommodating swimbaits of any size. This system keeps soft baits from kinking, bending and hard baits from scratching and pre-mature damage. All swimbaits will be organized and easily accessible on the water. 


-6061 Billet Aluminum Bar
-Anodized Black
-Stainless Steel Bolts
-8 Rubber O-rings & Snaps

* BAITS NOT INCLUDED

name: Egbert Swimbait Storage Rod
description:
Egbert Swimbait Storage bar consists of  a 6061 billet aluminum rod anodized black that allows you to store up to 8 swimbaits in a Plano 3731 storage box. The groove system with rubber o-rings and snaps lets you move baits around with ease while accommodating swimbaits of any size. This system keeps soft baits from kinking, bending and hard baits from scratching and pre-mature damage. All swimbaits will be organized and easily accessible on the water. Included with the swimbait storage bar is an easy to use installation template.

Add 2 Egbert Swimbait Storage bars to a Plano 3731 and store 16, 6" or smaller swimbaits.

-6061 Billet Aluminum Bar
-Anodized Black
-Stainless Steel Bolts
-8 Rubber O-rings & Snaps
-Installation template

  FREE SHIPPING!!!

* BAITS NOT INCLUDED
* BOX NOT INCLUDED
